G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
The Game class This class represents the window that has all the graphics for the third room of the Waterworks program.
Game(Stage, int) - Constructor for class Game
This is the class constructor.
GameChar - Class in <Unnamed>
The GameChar class This class stores the object that represents the in game avatar that the user will be controlling to play.
GameChar(String) - Constructor for class GameChar
This is the class constructor, and it creates an Image object that represents the avatar, using the super constructor from the Image class.
get(String) - Static method in class Resources
This method is used to retrieve an Object added to the Hashmap during loading with its String identifier.
getChoice() - Method in class LevelSelect
This is the method that shows the levelSelect graphics, gets the user's choice, and returns it to the StageManager
getChoice() - Method in class Menu
This method drives the class by running the appropriate methods at the right times, and returning the chosen option to StageManager.
getEndStatus() - Method in class Game
This method returns the value of the program's end status.
getFrame(double) - Method in class AnimatedImage
The getFrame() method, which returns the frame of an animation based off of the time entered.

The getFrame() method, which returns the frame of an animation based off of the time entered.
getHeight() - Method in class Water
 
getLength() - Method in class LogLine
This method returns the number of columns in the array representing the pixels of the image(the width of the image).
getPlayButtonClicked() - Method in class Quiz
This method returns the value of the playButtonClicked variable, which stores whether or not the Play button to move on to the next room has been clicked.
getQuizButtonClicked() - Method in class Learn
This method returns the value of the quizButtonClickedProperty, determining if the Quiz button has been clicked.
getSplashFrame(double) - Method in class AnimatedImage
The getSplashFrame() method, which returns the frame of an animation based off of the time entered.
